title: lf plat+ jg
body:
with jepman leaving us on good terms, we're after a plat+ jgler who is willing to spend time practising and playing with the team

having a good champion pool + shotcalling would be definitely preferable

we tend to scrim/play most nights of the week

add me ingame for trials - yes im danger (if that doesnt work then use tb danger)

replies.body: i am ur man plat 5 main jungl/top
ah we're an oce team dude, sorry about that.
